document.full_text: a government agency shared some $470,000 seized during an investigation into illegal internet gambling businesses with the maryland's anne arundel county police department, the agency said on thursday.
document.title: federal government shares money seized in crime with county
lines_and_colors: a government agency shared some $470,000 seized during an investigation into illegal internet gambling businesses with the maryland's anne arundel county police department, the agency said on thursday.
